reviews.review: This is seriously the best story of any game I've ever played. I highly recommend!

- Букер, ты боишься Бога?
- Нет, но я боюсь тебя.

С этих слов начинается одна из самых увлекательных историй, когда-либо рассказанных в видеоиграх. Bioshock Infinite можно смело ставить на одну полку с Half-Life. В игре все продумано до мелочей. Нет ни одного ненужного или неуместного NPC. Нет ни одного неиспользуемого ствола, ни одного неактуального плазмида. В историю можно углубиться настолько, насколько это покажется необходимым. Можно вообще пробежать всю игру, не прослушав ни одного аудиодневника, экшн составляющая выше всяких похвал. А можно зайти в каждый закоулок, изучить каждый плакат и каждую газету, мир проработан до мелочей. Графика для своего времени не блещет фотореалистичностью, но на самом деле, о какой вообще реалистичности может идти речь? Герой в компании с девушкой, открывающей межпространственные дыры силой мысли продвигается по утопичному городу, стреляя из руки воронами... Графика ровно настолько хороша, насколько это необходимо. 

В общем всячески рекомендую. Перепроходить раз в полгода. 10/10

Eines der besten Spiele, die ich je gespielt habe! Die Story ist unglaublich spannend und super verknüpft mit den bisherigen Bioshock Vorgängern. Alleine wegen der Story lohnt es sogar die DLCs Burial at Sea 1+2 zu kaufen. Das Gameplay ist flüssig und die Möglichkeiten im Spiel vielfältig. 

Für alle die sich über einen First-Person-Shooter mit guter Story freuen ein Muss!
i wish i could play it for the first time again, great game like the other bioshocks

Oynadığım en başarılı oyunlardan biri. Hikayesi etkileyici ve sürükleyici. Karekterlerin kişisel özellikleri ve tepkileri çok iyi yapılmış. Bölümlerin her biri birbirinden göz alıcı ve durup zaman geçirilecek güzellikte. Genel olarak almayı düşünecekseniz hiç tereddüt etmeden alın. Farklı seçimleri ve  kafa yoran inanılmaz hikayesi ile; tam anlamı ile 10 numara 5 yıldız bir oyun

The bird or the cage?

After beating the main game on 1999 mode and completing the two story DLCs, I can say that Bioshock Infinite is one of the best games I have ever played. The game's story is one of the best single-player stories out there. It manages to be emotional, thrilling, and dark at the same time. With this amazing story though, comes a wonderful atmosphere. Columbia is a beautiful city in the clouds that has a very twisted and dark side to it. Nothing in this game is as it seems. Just when you think you know what's happening, it turns another twist on you. Now on to the characters, this game has a lot of memorable characters. You will care for some of these characters, while others you will see as pure evil. Overall, the story, atmosphere, and characters make this game a masterpiece that proves why videogames can be art. I heavily recommend this game to anyone who truly loves gaming.

Le héros qui a le charisme d'un caillou, qui n'est jamais inquiété par ce qui se passe autour de lui (le type se retrouve propulsé sur une ville dans les nuages, unique réaction: "Ok, cool.").

Le pourquoi je devrais en avoir quelque chose à foutre d'Elizabeth qui n'est jamais expliqué avant la toute fin, du coup on en a rien a battre du scénar jusqu'au 10 dernières minutes du jeu. Aucun enjeu = aucune implication pour le joueur.

Les pnj féminins qui se ressemblent toutes avec leur têtes de bébé trisomique.

C'est linéaire comme mon colon.

Le vol qui devient interdit subitement au bout de 3-4h de jeu dans un niveau, alors que je pille tout depuis le début au nez et à la barbe des habitants.

Elizabeth qui semble connaitre toute la ville comme sa poche alors qu'elle est restée enfermée dans sa tour d'ivoire pendant 5 siècles.

Une porte qui se referme subitement par une coupure d'électricité alors qu'on s'apprête à la passer : une embuscade ? Un chemin alternatif à trouver ou un moyen de rétablir le courant ??? NOPE, appuie juste sur X pour ouvrir la porte avec les mains et c'est bon.

Les pnj qui m'aggressent subitement parce que j'ai osé pirater un distributeur alors que 10sec plus tôt j'ai balancé par mégarde un piège de feu dans la foule et ça n'a choqué personne. 

Eizabeth qui chie tous les objets de la terre pour nous les filer (plus besoin de s'emmerder à looter comme ça, pratique).

Les dialogues de 3 lignes qui se terminent juste pas "Oui.", "Je vois." ou "Hmm."

Les failles spatio-temporelle et les mondes parallèles, pirouette scénaristique innovante et révolutionnaire. Oh wait!

Les gunfights chiants contre les 5 mêmes types d'ennemis qui cassent le rythme toutes les 2min.

Le jeu qui a des chutes de frame rate incessantes toutes les 20sec, problème heureusement résolu grâce aux forums steam mais ça n'enlève rien au fait que ce soit intolérable de ne pas patcher ce bordel.

Ce jeu est exaspérant, jouez plutôt à Dishonored, c'est mieux.
This game has definitely taken a turn from the original two. As a fan of both I like the direction it took. The immersive world of Columbia along with it’s backstory is something worth exploring.

I don't think I need to add to the list of glowing reviews but Infinite is an amazing game that will leave you reeling.
If you thought Rapture was jaw dropping, wait till you uncover the world of Infinite. Amazing twists and an engaging story set to a brilliant backdrop of a world in the clouds, I was truly pulled into it and spat out a beautifully emotional mess.
The little achievments also make you want to play again and find all the small plot points that were missed first (or second!) round, adding to the colour and intricacy of the story and the gameplay.
Prepare to be perplexed and wanting to go deeper, this game is more like an interactive film - in the best way possible - but also a great FPS if you want to try it on a harder mode.
Truly a legendary game that will not age.

This game. This freaking game.

Well I finished BioShock Infinite a few minutes ago, and I'm still....shocked. It's just...okay, let's put it in topics. (Also pardon my english)

[b] Story: 10/10 [/b] A complete mindf*ck, that leaves you frightened from top to bottom and makes you want to hug your newborn child and cry in the corner. I honestly can't compliment the script enough. Loved the concept of American exceptionalism, perfectly executed. I won't talk much about the lore itself, since I recommend you to actually buy the game and have your own experience from a blank sight.

[b] Characters: 9.5/10 [/b] I actually managed to laugh with Booker DeWitt, who's extremely charismatic, and a bit of an assh*le. But the spark of the lightbulb here is Elizabeth. Oh boy, Elizabeth. You will fall in love with her, I assure you. She's one of the most charismatic characters I've ever encountered in a videogame. Elizabeth also helps you in-combat, providing Ammunition, Healthpacks and Salts. She can also unlock a few doors and throw you a random coin. It might sound silly, but you'll never get tired from seeing those animations. Speaking of combat...

[b] Combat: 7/10 [/b] I hope you don't hate me for this, but I've never truly been a fan of the usual "BioShock combat style". Yet, if you love it go ahead! The combat itself doesn't change much, but the addition of different guns and different Vigors can and will make you enjoy it. The Vigors are great, and the amount of combos you can do is huge. The enemies are also diversified, and some will even make you wet your pants and die a little on the inside. Adding ziplines, the help of Elizabeth (I'll avoid mentioning that much because of spoilers) [spoiler] and a fucking bird [/spoiler] contributes to make the combat extremely fun. But then again, I'm not a huge fan of such combat.

[b] Map Design as a whole: 10/10 [/b] Simply astonishing. As an amateur Concept Designer, you wouldn't believe the amount of Screenshots I took. The artstyle is, as always, nice and smooth. I'm not gonna lie, I managed to get lost a few times, exploring stuff and finding random collectibles. I recommend you to..."enter" the game, and feel the whole atmosphere. But oh boy the scenarios.... I mean, it's a f*cking city in the middle of the clouds, if you don't like that, you're weird, yo.

[b] Final note: 9.5/10 [/b] BioShock Infinite is one of the most well-written and well-executed games I've ever played so far, yet the Combat felt a bit boring for me. The game can be very challenging, specially on 1999 Mode (Don't ask). It's a must-have for players who aren't into BioShock that much, such as myself, and a treasure for BioShock fans.

[spoiler] I know a few BioShock millenials didn't like Inifinite because "it doesn't look like BioShock", but come on, dudes. [/spoiler]

Un triple A en toda regla.
Es uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado desde hace mucho tiempo, tiene una historia impecable y unos personajes muy bien contruidos con sus personalidades, no peca tanto de la repeticion de niveles y de ser "el chico de los recados" como en el primer bioshock. Su apartado artistico es precioso, podria pasarme horas simplemete viendo columbia. La jugabilidad aunque sea un fps es muy entretenida con la mecanica de los vigorizadores. Muy rejugable, sobre todo con el modo 1999 que es un verdadero reto. Tiene dos DLC´s que son impresionantes cada uno en general un juego 10 mi nota seria un 9,5/10 porque nada es perfecto y por ejemplo en este bioshock no tendremos una interaccion en el videojuego como en los anteriores titulos, pudiendo elegir en ciertos momentos; y se pasa mucho con la accion y los tiroteos (mas comercial) aun asi no puedo sacarle defectos. 
Si te gustan los videojuegos y las buenas historias compradlo.
为了女主角，玩这个游戏，值了。

Che dire....... mi sono innamorato di questo gioco! La trama è bellissima, i personaggi sono fenomenali come il carattere di ognuno di loro, l'ambientazione è fantastica, ben riuscita e i luoghi di Columbia che si possono esplorare sono veramente tanti, non bisogna avere fretta di proseguire perchè si rischia di perdere parti importanti del gioco, trovare armi potenti e oggetti utilissimi.                                              
Non ci sono aggettivi per descrivere il gioco......è unico nel suo genere.
Il colpo di scena finale mi ha lasciato con un'enorme vuoto dentro di me lasciandomi un po' triste, speravo in un finale diverso. Avrei voluto che questo gioco non avesse una fine, che fosse Infinite!
In un paio di punti nel gioco devo dire anche che mi stavo cagando sotto XD, l'atmosfera era tetra e con un tocco di horror. 
Ho provato anche i primi due Bioshock ma nn mi sono piaciuti, questo Bioshock, per me, è il migliore di tutti. 

VALUTAZIONE 100/100

14 years I've lived, I've never played a games like this. Althrought this games was available in  2013, I just started playing it this year. My friend, Lawrence Keynes, told me that this games was a wonderful ending, and he'd show me the ending.After that, I start wonder why Elizabeth.... I can't spoiled it. And then, I started playing this games and at the same time knowing the ending. This games is well-made games. It is almost perfect everything. The plot, the character, the gameplay and everything that came up with this games. Honestly, I've went to mind therapy to forget everything about this games just to fell the emotions again and again. I've done this twice.The most I loved about this games is Elizabeth. She is your greatest companion. She'll do anything to make you survied the situations. Once I've played this games, my attitudes changed. This games taught me many thing. About life, love, faith and many thing. If I'm a millionaire, I'll buy you all this games. I really recommended this games. Love you Bioshock Infinite. Please buy it if you affordable.

"booker!... elizabeth!... booker!... elizabeth!..."

i found the mambo jambo story, that is told as incoherently and confusingly as possible, to be pretty annoying actually. the style reminded me a bit of the amelie movie. the dialogs seemed to be a series of unsubstantiated drama hype-ups.

the presentation including animations are nice and the art style is unique, but the game world felt a bit samey. most of the time the environments did not really capture my imagination. it is simple buildings flying in the sky, so?

the game is a mostly linear and repetitive shooter: battle scenario, walk around, battle scenario, repeat till the end. the gameplay has issues though: for example, the weapons that can be found do not seem to get more advanced as one progresses. from early on the dozens of new weapons just seemed to be similar to old ones but less effective and not worth picking up. it is not possible to carry more than two weapons: to pick up a new weapon another one has to be thrown out, without knowing when and if it will ever be found again.
i was out of ammunition often in the second half of the game, it was almost not possible to proceed.
the vigor/spells can be fun, but they can also be ignored.

i did not like the characters, the voices, the story, much of the graphics. the game mechanics were fun enough to complete it, even though i kinda wish i didnt.

This is easily one of the best games that I have ever played. The gameplay is fun, never overly repetitive, the abilities completelty change how encounters pan out and there are a multitude of solutions that can be applied to every scenario. The story is strong as hell. There are multiple twists and this is one of the few games whereas I actually gave a crap about the characters while also enjoying the fighting. Nothing feels tacked on. Just amazing. The only bad thing about the game is that it raises expectations for other games, making them look bad by comparison.

The snake that eats its own tail, forever and ever. (quote from “Predestination” ,thanks Robert A. Heinlein)

The develop team brings out sparks in this game, amazing game screen and wonderful music, exciting action part like fighting in the air though sky-line, numerous guns to choose from, special vigors which are different and did not meet before...worth it to be in our library collection.

Only two weapons can be carried on at one time, tough when dealing with a bunch of enemies, though one would carefully focus what his major weapon should be, (mine is the carbine) and it is more realistic comparing with other action games. The vigors (magic power) are special but not over powered, they can act as assistance and make player chance and fun to kill the enemies.  

Above all, the story delights me deeply and to be the brightest star among all its features. Bare introduction in beginning of the main character, Booker, lead out surprisingly change after the cross with Elizabeth. One will be sad when Elizabeth being caught in the tower with finger cut; one will be touched when Elizabeth dancing in the beach freely, one will be puzzled when seeing Booker in the debt chasing scene again and again. All these build up the game that every one of us should not miss.

It will be a pity that if not buying the whole game with season pass, (pity happens on me...), I will try the DLC after passing the masterpiece once more, the story seems not yet end for main set.  

If you go to sea of doors and meet infinite light views during the game, please, please, please, adjourn to stay with Elizabeth there until bored, the stars of the sky is one of the greatest views I see throughout the game and make me enjoy the moment. There may be spoil of the story so I put my feels and suggestion below. Read if you do not mind. 





“There is always a lighthouse, there’s always a man, there’s always a city.” Elizabeth whispered after the door opened, I wish Elizabeth never had the key. The loop end starting there, I think bad ending make us unforgettable, and it is the success of a story. If there is still a choice, I hope Booker stopped his curious and brought Elizabeth to anywhere but there (Paris may be?), I may not get through the whole story, perhaps Elizabeth already turn down the suggestion to Paris before.

Nel complesso è una giusta evoluzione della serie, che migliora su tutti i punti più importanti, anche se breve lascia molto al giocatore per la sua storia curata, il gun-play non è il top, ma riesce cmq a stupire anche perchè la sua vera particolarità è la storia.

This game is, to put it simply, a masterpiece. 

The storyline is beautful and complex; deep and immersive, and by the end I felt like I had experienced the game as opposed to merely playing it. The Burial At Sea DLCs* are a must - at first they might seem too expensive but they are well worth it. 

Elizabeth, your companion, is the best part of the game by far. She doesn't just assist you in a tight scrape or in open combat but she also serves as, well, a companion. By the end of the game, you get the impression that this Elizabeth was the main character, not you.

The combat is intuitive and enjoyable. Despite this game being an FPS the combat is not the strong point of this game, but it is still enjoyable, with the main game 'going' for a more open combat, traditional approach and the BaS DLCs 'going' for stealth based gameplay. The gameplay is enjoyable and effective and doesn't let down the game at all, but don't buy and play BioShock Infinite simply because it's an FPS. You might not get as much enjoyment if you do. 

I did have a technical issue when playing this game initially (my second 'load' of the game), but I believe this was down to the fact that I'm using Windows 10, and BioShock Infinite isn't officially supported on Windows 10. I'm not the only one, by far, to have had issues running BioShock Infinite with Windows 10, but all it required was to reinstall the game. I didn't have any issues for the next 19 hours + of gameplay. I personally wouldn't let this put you off, but having played the game, I suppose I'm bias.

Overall, BioShock Infinite is one of the best games I've every played. It has an incredible storyline and very good gameplay, and Elizabeth is just amazing. Arguably the best AI in any game, ever. 
9.5/10, and I'd give it 10/10 if it wasn't for the fact I had to reinstall it once. At the time I'm writing this review, 95% of the 54,511 reviews are positive. That really does say it all. Just buy this game and experience it. You won't regret it.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*Word of warning though, the BaS DLCs are noticably darker than the main game, and there is a particular scene within Episode Two that some may find disturbing - it's rating is what it is for a reason. 
[spoiler]The scene in question is, essentially, a torture scene that you cannot skip. It's about 5 minutes long. [/spoiler]

Najlepszy shooter fabularny ostatnich lat, w którym gameplay to rzecz drugo planowa. Gra na początku wydaje się w miarę prosta w przedstawianiu fabuły, ale z godziny na godzine staje się coraz bardziej fabularnie zagmatwana dla naszego mózgu, by na końcu wywołać u nas czysty brain fuck w zakończeniu. Wszystko w tej grze chodzi jak w zegarku, świetne dopracowane lokacje, znakomity sound track, oraz wybitna fabuła, z przyjemnym strzelaniem dają nam znakomitą dawkę rozrywki na ok 10 godzin. Jedyną rzeczą do jakiej można sie w tej grze przyczepić to miejscami przedłużające się już potyczki, w trakcie których człowiek może się już niecierpliwić, pod wpływem chęci poznania dalszej fabuły. Jednym słowem znakomita gra, i zbrodnią jest zamiast ją przejść samemu, oglądać gameplaye w necie.

10/10

Dummdreiste Kopie des ersten Teils. 

Während der 1. Teil eine glaubwürdige Story aufbaute, das Spiel selbst den Spieler an die Hand nahm, um ihn in seiner Welt willkommen zuheißen, versucht der dritte Teil einfach nur originell zu wirken, ohne es zu sein.
Die Story ist krude, sofern man die Abfolge von sinnlos motivierten Handlungsereignissen eine Story nennen kann.
Das Spiel läßt den Spieler absichtlich mit zig Fragen allein, um sich wichtig zutun. Die einzige Folge ist aber nur, dass der Spieler gelangweilt von Speicherpunkt zu Speicherpunkt taumelt, abundan ein paar Pixel tötet, von einer Tussi, die offentbar im Genlabor gezüchtet wurde, genervt wird mit ständigem Nörgeln und im Wegrumlaufen- oder Stehen.

Wie ein Freund meinte, das Spiel ist seelenlos. Genau das ist es, und noch weniger; ... es ist Schund. 

Absoluter Fail nach einem Spiel wie BioShock, dem Original. Selbst als eigenständiges Spiel ohne Vorgänger wäre es noch Müll.
Ich hoffe, dass ich bald am Spielende bin, damit ich den Mist deinstallieren kann.

Отличный сюжет, который затягивает с первых минут. Шикарная атмосфера, которая просто обвалакивает тебя, когда ты попадаешь в Колумбию. Интересный геймплей, который не даст заскучать, благодаря немалому количеству плазмидов и способов их комбинирования. Очаровательная Элизабет.... Хорошая, но не феноменальная, графика. И, пожалуй, самый неприятный момент - отсутствие русской озвучки. 
Это все Bioshock Infinite - игра, которая обязательна к прохождению.

Good FPS game. Characters are interesting, and your side character, Elizabeth, isn't a weakling, whiner, or dies easily in battles. That's huge plus. People ooze over the narrative, especially toward the end (no spoilers), but after thinking and a second play through, it made plenty of sense and wasn't too confusing. Definitely mind blowing. If you've read Louis Jorge Borges 'Garden of Forking Paths,' this game uses the same idea. 

Loot is good, enemies are interesting, and dialogue works well most of the time. A good fps game worth a second run through, or a third.

DLCs: haven't played but have watched. Honestly felt like the studio tried too damn hard to connect the stories of Bioshock Infinite with Bioshock, cluttering otherwise good games with a rushed and clearly unplanned ending. Ignore them unless you're interested.

Bioshock Infinite is not really Bioshock. The setting and tone is like on the polar opposite side of the spectrum. But I can't say I didn't like it. The story was quite excellent. It does, however, suffer from quite uninspired gunplay and the vigors are not as satisfying as they could be. The storytelling also suffers from the issue that the characters just ignore what happen to them (like becoming broken and shit in one scene, but 1 second later making jokes about picking a lock).

All of this isn't that bad. I would've put it as recommended if that was the case. But the ending. I will not give any spoilers here, but I will tell you that it's the most insulting ending of all time. It ends, just like with Bioshock 1 with a plottwist, but it's a plottwist that even M. Night Shyamalan would be disgusted by. If you feel like you want to play through the story, stop before the ending, because it will only make you angry.

a complete different spin and game then the other 2 bioshock which i find good but i do prefer the dark and spooky atmosphere of the first bioshock. However this game is pretty good with amazing graphics and new fun abilities like  the sky rail which i love. Only draw backs is you cant carry all ur weapons and for the dlc going back to rapture  what made me not enjoy it as much is you cant use the plasmids used in the first two games which kills the experiance as i prefer those way more. over all its a 8.5/10

yes! самая лучшая игра в которую Вы должны сыграть и почувствовать все её превосходства над другими играми, так как Ты можешь выбирать любой (ну почти) способ убийства врага. Я прошла всю серию bioshock, и я была не разочарована что потратила время зря на эту игру....если хотите брать эту игру, то советую купить всю серию так-как вся серия связана (ну как связана 1 и 3 и ДЛС).    Это произведение искусства , которое заставляют быть шутером, и который обязан пройти, игра стоит этих денег.

This game was awesome! I have got to say that this is one of the best FPS-story games I've ever played!

Pros:
 • Beautiful atmosphere
 • Good story with plot twists
 • No loading screens between areas
 • Spooky areas (Fog, robots that scans for your presence, some jumpscares)

Cons:
 • Somewhat strict regarding things you can do (Loot, kill, buy, etc.)

I have got to say that I really enjoyed this game, and I've got to play it sometime later again!

I would rate: 9/10 - definately recommending this game!

绝对的神作！！！强烈推荐！！！     一口气打通了本体和海葬2个DLC，感觉不要太酸爽。本来是打算等朋友时用来消遣时间的，结果玩着玩着就和就着了魔一样，一下子就陷进去了。剧情环环相扣不要太赞，从一开始Booker潜入哥伦比亚对天空之城的惊叹再到进入游乐园时对那两兄妹频频暗示的狐疑，一步一步的让我了解到整个世界的背景，从开始伊丽莎白的身世的探索再到最后的反转，像看电影一般，沉迷其中乐此不疲。最后的结局没有看懂啊准备二周目再补一编把漏掉的细节给补上来。再说海葬两部曲，通过DLC的形式将三代和一代又联系了起来，一切始于销魂城又终于销魂城。对销魂城鼎盛时刻的复刻还是很良心的，一代里各种各样的人物和地方都可以在DLC里看见。尤其是那一群王八蛋戴着兔子面具的变态，在很早之前玩一代的时刻被吓到很多次没想到这么多年以后还能再看见正常人类形态的的。总的来说还是很满意啊，玩完了3代又打算把一代再重温一遍了。有人吐槽画风讲真这种画面其实我还是蛮喜欢的。[spoiler] 战斗系统不做评价，因为我也感觉不出什么23333	[/spoiler]并不是收集党所以一路上对于收集要素也没有强迫症，大部分的道具都很好找一般都不会错过。配乐也很好，指路系统对路痴来说简直是福音。[spoiler] 妈妈再也不用担心我找不到路了[/spoiler]暂时先写这么多，以后想到什么会再补的。最后表白伊丽莎白 :3 ！！！以上

Шутер от первого лица с присутствием фантастики и экшена! Прыжки на 10 метров, аэротрассы, роботы-машины, туррели и много прочего... В игре фантастическая графика для 2013 года, ну и самое важное - СЮЖЕТ! 
Советую к покупке также DLC: Bureal at sea 1 и 2 эпизод. Если 1 эпизод я бы оценил на 4/5, то 2 эпизод однозначно 5+/5!

К покупке строго рекомендую! Не пожалеете!
Ah just classic.

Всего было потрачено 12 часов, их сполна хватает чтобы насладиться до мелочей проработанным миром, сумашедшим экшном и переварить весьма сложный сюжет, над которым не перестаешь думать после его прохождения. Немного остался разочарованным, очень ждал хеппи энда, который так и не наступил...

Die Story ist ziemlich verwirrend, wenn man sich nicht auf sie konzentriert. Die Spielelemente sind komplex aber duchschaubar. Alles in allem mit einer spannenden Story, einer hübschen Grafik und vielen Möglichkeiten sehr zu empfehlen.

艺术品般完美的游戏


【有官方繁中，请右键游戏选项语言栏】
自从2004年 Half - Life 2 之后再没有一个游戏能够打动我。

直到我玩了这款 BioShock Infinite


之前也玩过生化奇兵一和二感觉不是自己的菜，当时只是抱着喜加一的心态入的生化奇兵折扣包。万般无聊之中手贱下载了这款生化奇兵无限，然后就无法自拔了..........
我已经想不出来有什么好词语能够一针见血的描述这款游戏了。


游戏的感觉如同艺术品般完美

游戏的剧情如同小说般曲折唯美
海葬DLC结局这波安利不错，坐等一代重置。
Ein sehr gutes Spiel aber leider kein sehr gutes Bioshockspiel.

玩了4.5遍還是決定改不推，尤其是海葬更是讓人覺得只是為了殺死伊莉莎白而出的，老實說無限之城對於生化奇兵的粉絲來說挺失望的。

優點:
1.一如既往的優秀美術風格與配樂，精緻的畫面讓人沉浸在優美的天空之城。
2.角色之間的互動很有趣、生動，而且主角終於有臉和會說話了。
3.流暢的動作和戰鬥。

缺點:
1.充滿BUG的劇情，直到結尾與海葬都沒有解釋清楚，再加上多重宇宙的設定，搞得整個劇情亂七八糟又莫名其妙，海葬結尾想連回1代的劇情卻又沒有任何解釋變成一個BUG。

2.戰鬥系統過於粗糙，雖說可能是為了和極樂城作區別，但不論是升級、補給、復活都使用同一種貨幣，導致很難自由的選擇戰鬥風格，尤其是在高難度模式，想不死根本不可能，然而死亡過多次就會造成升級和補給的困難。

伊莉莎白的存在雖然說是個非常好的輔助NPC，但整個戰鬥變成過度依賴伊莉莎白作補給，主角只能攜帶2把武器，可攜帶彈藥又不多，無法自行補充生命和能量，在伊莉莎白不在的部分戰鬥就會變得尤為困難。

其他:
一.1999模式的巨臂匠硬得有夠誇張，尤其是在打革命軍那隻的時候還有一堆小兵，全部彈藥都打完了還是打不死，我還特地帶了子彈最多的機槍，最後死得太多次錢都沒了，就放棄了。

二.所以到底為什麼布克自殺，所有宇宙的康姆斯托克都會消失? 布克和康姆斯托克不是不同宇宙的布克嗎??

三.海葬裡說如果回到自己死去的那個世界伊莉莎白就會喪失打開裂隙的能力，那麼蓮花姊弟為何沒事? 明明本傳就有錄音說他們還親眼看過自己的屍體，而且他們貌似還能同時存在在所有世界。

四.海葬最後伊莉莎白成功救了莎莉也成功讓傑克成為極樂城的救世主，那其他世界呢? 海葬的世界很明顯是不同的世界，那麼其他世界的傑克到底是怎麼被帶回極樂城的，整個有夠奇怪。
Просто классный шутер, с хорошим сюжетом и атмосферой. Да и просто стрелять по ссаным врагам.
Very good many gmes
